comments:
Build 12/6/01

get the following error.  The error occurs at what appears to be the end of the 
operation.

Got a newer build (20011219) and was able to add the project.  HOWEVER, I'm not 
sure if this was a consequence of the build or of the network performance at the 
time.  The Add to Workspace operation seemed a lot faster with the new build, 
but it may have been that our network was less bogged down.

It was most likely poor network performance that caused the error. The default 
timeout for CVS communications is 60 seconds. This value is confiugurable in 
the CVS preferences pages (a sub page of Team).
